title: I don't understand???
body:
So last night it sent my friend a mystery skin gift. The skin they received was pirate ryze. I was interested to know how much he was worth so I went to the store and Pirate Ryze wasn't there? 

So I was woundering how much he cost?

And how come I can gift him that but I can't buy it myself? 

Please help Ty Brad.

replies.body: Pirate Ryze is a 975RP Harrowing Legacy skin. It is usually only available to buy during Halloween for a short time basically.

But how come I can mystery gift it if it's not in the store anymore?

Does that mean that I could possibly gift rusty blitzcrank? 
Or shamrock Malphite?

> [{quoted}](name=Annoying Turtle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P3ZRdIFa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-24T02:03:36.730+0000)
>
> But how come I can mystery gift it if it's not in the store anymore?
> 
> Does that mean that I could possibly gift rusty blitzcrank? 
> Or shamrock Malphite?

Shamrock Malphite yeah. Rusty Blitzcrank no. Here is a link to the Mystery Gift FAQ. Should answer all questions. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ
yes, and im pretty sure mystery gifts have the chance to give players almost any skin even if its unavailable in shop right? im not sure though
